document_data.name: Undead Bane Weapon
document_data.mainbody: '''''Undead bane weapon''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] used by [[paladin]]s. This spell originated from [[Kelemvor]], the god of the dead.
document_data.Effects: This spell enchanted a weapon to cause additional harm against the [[undead]]. This spell worked on melee weapons and up to 50 [[arrow]]s or other projectile weapons.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a weapon to cast.
